data.actual_result: No error message is shown, the modal simply displays the Discord url without the invite code at the end
data.expected_result: An error message shown stating something along the lines of "The maximum allowed invites to this server has been reached"
data.short_description: No error message shown when trying to create a new invite to a server which has reached the max amount of invite creations
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a large server that has reached the max allowed invite creations - Attempt to create a new invite
